name: Apple Pie Pancakes
description: Light and fluffy gluten-free pancakes are the perfect vehicle for a pool of melting butter, a drizzle of maple syrup, or a dollop of Summer Berry Dip.
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, add mix, spice, eggs, milk, 2 tbsp oil, and vanilla extract; stir just until mixed.
  2. Heat a large non-stick fry pan or griddle over medium heat; lightly brush with oil.
  3. Working in batches, scoop 3-4 pancakes into pan, leaving space between them. 
  4. Cook until bubbles appear on top, about 3 min. Flip and cook until bottoms are golden brown, about 1–2 more min. Transfer to a Sheet Pan lined with two Cooling Racks; keep warm in preheated 250° F oven until ready to serve.
tips: Use melted coconut oil for easy frying and great flavour.
